greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Regular triangle where T(n,k) is the number of labeled k-uniform hypergraphs spanning n vertices.
formula: T(n, k) = Sum_{d = 0...n} (-1)^(n - d) binomial(n, d) 2^binomial(d, k).
xref: Second column is A006129. Third column is A302374. Row sums are A306021.
results.author: _Gus Wiseman_, Jun 18 2018
